fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game the Ninetales can set a players house on fire scorching anyone that visits them. This deals a powerful attack to the player itself and any visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this is rolled and no Fox Heads are rolled, roll a Fox Head.
- Can not perform the factional kill and use ability the same night.
- Your ability takes the place of the factional kill for the night that you use it.
